projects.name: DalenW.io
projects.description: This is my website. It is an ongoing project to showcase my skills and a little bit about my life. I will always be updating it and changing it around. It used to be on a github site, then I rewrote it and put it under node.js, and then I rewrote it again and it is now on Caddy.

projects.name: Hackintosh Guide
projects.description: This was my final project for my beginner web design class. Hackintoshing is a little hobby of mine, and I wrote a guide on how to create your very own hackintosh. I do not update this guide at all, and is most likely out of date.

projects.name: Weather
projects.description: A class project I did in my beginner web design class. Talk to an API and display the weather. Pretty straight forward. This site is ugly.

projects.name: Robot
projects.description: This was a library I wrote in high school for the MATE underwater robotics competition that year. Essentially, it allows you to send & recieve data from an arduino, and it also contains code to get data from a joystick and a USB camera. I used this library to write my MATE-Control application.

projects.name: MATE-Control
projects.description: The program I used to control my robot in the MATE underwater robotics competition. I distinctly remember me writing a UI to go with this, but I guess there isn't one.

projects.name: Word Bubble
projects.description: I have no idea when or why I wrote this, but enjoy.

projects.name: Catch the Link
projects.description: I have no idea when or why I wrote this, but enjoy.
